data.name: Base Reward Token
data.description:
## Whats is Base Reward Token  (BRT)?

Base reward token is a decentralized finance token that rewards its holders 60% of ecosystem as liquidity. Base Reward Token aims at reinventing the way customers get rewarded for their loyalty by earning BRT tokens on every transaction done within any of our services, and token holders get rewarded for Holding tokens by staking them to mint more tokens.

The core idea is to combine cryptocurrency, blockchain technology, and different businesses in one place and get users rewarded for their loyalty, share in revenue and participate in decision making as "TOKEN HOLDER". Rewards shall be given to all users in token, for every transaction carried out on any of our services platforms.

## Base Reward Token Services

* INSTANT EXCHANGER : for easy crypto swaps within minutes (https://swap.basereward.online)
* CARD SERVICES : reloadable debit cards that gives its users the freedom to spend their crypto with easily.
* E-COMMERCE : an easy to trade marketplace that allow its users to buy and sell safe and securely using Crypto and Fiat.
* Gaming : competitives games build on blockchain with revenue possibilities for gamers.
* Crypto Wallet : a non-custodial crypto wallet thats gives it users the ability earn tokens just for carrying out transactions within the wallet.

## What makes Base Reward Token Unique ?

* REWARD HOLDER : 60% of all profits from the ecosystem will be given to token holders as liquidity. Also users get reward in tokens for just using our services.
* STAKING : token holders can mint more token by staking their tokens  (https://finance.basereward.online) to mint more token.
* BUY- BACK AND BURN : every quater, with the 60% ecosystem profit provided as liquidity, 70% of the tokens bought will be burn.
* GOVERNANCE : token holders/community have the ability to determine in what direction the token project flows.
* LIMITED SUPPLY : total supply of Base Reward Token is capped to 12 000 000 tokens to ever exist.

## Where to buy Base Reward Token ( BRT ) ? 

Token is presently listed on Pancakeswap : (https://exchange.pancakeswap.finance/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x0d499b25bce7aa72bb6c50e434e2ed26fe1e785d) more other exchanges will be coming soon.
